question: Will Agents/Brokers and Assisters be able to assist customers by phone in a similar way to how they can through web-brokers?
text:
Will Agents/Brokers and Assisters be able to assist customers by phone in a similar way to how they can through web-brokers?
          
        
Pennie-certified brokers and assisters can help their customers by accessing the customers account through their broker/assister portal. Pennie-certified brokers and assisters can also help a new customer complete a new application on Pennie, as long as the customer is new to Pennie. Existing customers will need to designate the Pennie-certified broker or assister through their customer portal (or by calling Pennie Customer Service). Only the customer can designate a broker or assister  Brokers and assisters cannot make/request the designation on behalf of the customer.
